column5: Two years ago I saw 9 moose in about a 20-mile stretch between IF and Dryden. 19 isn't out of the realm of possibility.
What kind of shape is #502 in? Any road construction or other "unexpected" road issues?Thanks,DC
we took 502 both ways the last week in june and it was smooth w/ no construction.
drove up on June 13th and back on June 21st and there were no problems..

I thought 502 was in great shape...except I saw 19 moose, 4 bears and 3 fox on the night trip back. There were two moose running down the sides of the road, I was in a group of 4 vehicles that somehow managed to drive straight between them. I don't think we can hear it enough, once it starts to get dark, slow down and keep your eyes wide open.
502 good shape....3 moose...5 deer...no bears nor foxes. Find a logging truck as a lead dog....Works
just got back this morning....smooth all the way
Just drove it today. Clear sailing.
19 Moose in about a 2 hour drive..wow..glad we drive it during daylight..
LOL, 19 moose?? Is that a type-o?
